quote: Keep your face always toward the sunshine -  shadows will fall behind you. – Walt Whitman
fact: A “quidnunc” is a person who is eager to know the latest news and gossip.
joke: Why do trees seem suspicious on sunny days? Dunno, they're just a bit shady.
